channel.title: What do i need to get started with delphi?
channel.description: i'd like to get started learning the delphi programming language, and i have no idea where to start. i've looked around and i just found alot of dead ends so if anyone can point me in the right direction for any needed applications i'd be thankful.

item.title: What do i need to get started with delphi?
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

[quote=“jcs_double, post:20, topic:3130”] are delphi and vb in any way related [/quote]Errr… well…
Delphi is often seen as Borland’s VB. It’s their attempt at making something very easy, like VB, but without limitations and with same compilation speeds as C++. And they did a fairly good job.

Read full topic
item.source: What do i need to get started with delphi?

item.title: What do i need to get started with delphi?
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

[quote=“jme_009, post:7, topic:3130”][quote author=Martin link=topic=3606.msg36030#msg36030 date=1148343692]
is scar not based on delphi?
[/quote]

Scar is like a modified version of pascal, which is pretty much the same as delphi. So… you could say that.[/quote]
You both are making it sound like SCAR is it’s own language… it’s just a pascal script engine with predefined functions for use COMPILED with Delphi. So it is not “like” delphi at all.

Read full topic
item.source: What do i need to get started with delphi?
